component.name: QDriverStation
component.summary: The open-source, cross-platform FRC Driver Station

description.p: he QDriverStation is a free and open-source alternative to the FRC Driver Station. It runs on the major operating systems (Windows, Mac and Linux) and allows teams to operate 2010-2014 robots and 2015-2016 robots. The QDriverStation is designed in a modular approach, it uses the LibDS to handle networking operations and QJoysticks to handle joystick input.
